title: City of Caldwell Branding
description: Caldwell, Kansas is a city rich with history that the community celebrates with pride with numerous tourism events highlighting their story. Located on the Chisholm Trail at the Kansas and Oklahoma border, the city quickly grew due to cattle drives from Texas. When rebranding the city of Caldwell, we aimed to tell their historic story while also capturing the current energy in the community to improve Caldwell and spur it into the future.

title: Black Hops Brewery (Before & After)
description: As beer lovers weâ€™re always excited for an opportunity to work with breweries, so when Australiaâ€™s Black Hops Brewery tasked us with converting their paper labeling system into new screen printed cans, we jumped at the chance. Working with the existing brand assets we introduced a two-tone system for a quicker read on shelves for each beer varietal, with the Black Hops mesh motifs coming along for the ride. More on the project on the DKNG site.
